title: Ready for You to Move in!

posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!

Easy Mountain and City Access in Littleton
Come home from a busy day to the serenity of towering shade trees and inviting mountain views.
Your one-bedroom or two-bedroom apartment at Cottonwood Creek is perfectly positioned between Denver and the mountains, with easy access via I-25 or C-470.

Great floor plans, spacious closets, individual washers and dryers, reserved, covered parking, a sparkling pool with sun deck, and lots of green space are some of the things you’ll love about living here.
But be forewarned: you won’t want to leave!
At RedPeak, we’re committed to delivering the best Denver-area living experiences because this is where we live, where we were founded, and where we’re solely focused.
We’re not a company that just manages properties.
We own every one of our buildings, and truly care about our communities and the people who call them home.
Continue below for more on Denver's Littleton area, as well as what amenities await you at Cottonwood Creek.
